title: Advanced Dental Morphology Practitioner Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Blended Learning Environment Utilizing Smartphone-Based Computer-Assisted Instruction (CAI) Tools

learning_goals: Learners can identify dental morphological features (nodules, fissures, cusps) with 90% accuracy using digital 3D models.
Learners can reproduce 3D dental structures with 80% accuracy using tablet-based drawing software.
Learners can achieve 20% higher precision in digital simulation assessments compared to traditional wax carving techniques.

resources: Practical Wax Blocks for Hands-on Practice
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
